constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 34 (Tuesday, February 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CROW:
H.R. 1226.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: The Congress shall have
Power To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among
the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H588]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Next Generation Entrepreneurship Corps Act
